code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Indicator(props){const[indicator,setIndicator]=useState('gray');useEffect(()=>{handleIndicator(props.length);},[props.length]);const handleIndicator=len=>{if(len<5){setIndicator('red');}else if(len<9){setIndicator('blue');}else{setIndicator('green');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between w-full items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xl text-white",children:"Strength"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rounded-[50%] bg-".concat(indicator,"-400 blur-sm w-5 h-5")})]});}export default Indicator;
